column4: hello, im following the typical ndiswrapper broadcom tutorial http://invaleed.wordpress.com/2007/11/20/install-bcm94311mcg-wlan-mini-pci-ubuntu-710/ , it says blacklist bcm43xx but its already there and i just did fresh install of heron. should i blacklist something else other than bcm43xx
you gotta google wirelessfix.sh and read the post
you're right, the default cutter drivers suck, google wirelessfix.sh for hardy and you'll find your answer for ndiswrapper
